page.title: 07DISABLED DRIVERS ASSN. HOTEL
page.content: {Ashwellthorpe Hall,HQ of the DDA & its {24-bedroomed holiday hotel,}has 21 bed rooms modified for the disabled with whole hotel wheelchair accessible.One suite is for severely disabled with electric-operated bed,hoist,toilet & all toilets/bathrooms are modified for different disabilities.Open all year, {it is occupied 6500 guest days p.a.}& guests come from all over U.K.,individ -ually or in groups.The hotel employs 8 full-time,8 part-time & casual staff & the DDA HQ,6 staff.The paved,wheel- chair accessible, Moat Walk round the grounds & a new carpark opened in 1985 & plans exist for new kitchens & for conversion of stable-block to rooms for the severely disabled.Annually, a fete & 2 or 3 buffet dances -renowned for delicious food- raise funds for extras,e.g. a minibus used for outings & collection of guests from Norwich.
